description:
The purpose of this deep dive course is to look at SAP S/4HANA in detail. The course is therefore structured along a customer lifecycle. We will begin by sharing more insights into the motivation behind SAP S/4HANA, the business value, and the strategy. After that, you will learn how to get started with SAP S/4HANA, how to test the product, and about onboarding. We then take you on a journey to discover the solution, including various lines of business, architecture, migration, and service aspects. Finally, you will learn where to get the appropriate support.

                                            Syllabus
                        Week 1: Why SAP S/4HANA?Week 2: Getting Started with SAP S/4HANAWeek 3: Adopt and Move to SAP S/4HANAWeek 4: Migration, Consulting, & SupportWeek 5: Final Exam
title: SAP S/4HANA – Deep Dive
instructors: Bert Schulze, Sven Denecken, Thomas Ruhl, Martin Naraschewski, Marcus Blaesi, Paul Smith, Alexander Diehl, Hans Kroes, Priti Prabhoo, Stefan Kätker, Rudolf Hois and Wieland Schreiner
